# PoolTogether Generic Hooks

A shared React hooks library for PoolTogether.

![version](https://img.shields.io/github/package-json/v/pooltogether/pooltogether-client-monorepo?filename=packages%2Fpt-generic-hooks%2Fpackage.json&color=brightgreen)

![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/typescript-%23007ACC.svg?style=flat&logo=typescript&logoColor=white)
![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/react-%2320232a.svg?style=flat&logo=react&logoColor=%2361DAFB)

![pt-utilities](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&message=pt-utilities&color=8050E3)
![pt-types](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&message=pt-types&color=8050E3)

## App Hooks

- `useCountdown`
- `useIsModalOpen`
- `useIsTestnets`
- `useSelectedCurrency`
- `useSelectedLanguage`

## CoinGecko Hooks

- `useCoingeckoExchangeRates`
- `useCoingeckoSimpleTokenPrices`
- `useCoingeckoTokenData`
- `useCoingeckoTokenPrices`
- `useCoingeckoTokenPricesAcrossChains`

## Constants

- `currencies`
- `languages`
